summary: Comprehensive testing of Ecommify Campaign Calculator MVP completed successfully. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI testing passed with excellent user experience and complete feature coverage.

design_issues.issue: Invalid PIN error notification briefly visible but clears quickly

passed_tests: Backend API health check - all endpoints functional
PIN-based authentication (Admin: 2409, Invalid PIN error handling)
Task management (CRUD operations and status updates)
Frontend login flow with PIN pad
Dashboard with 4 shop tabs (ecom1-4) and month navigation
KPI cards displaying revenue, ads, netto, zysk, ROI
Add income/expense dialogs with form validation
Kanban task board (3 columns: Do zrobienia, W trakcie, Gotowe)
Task creation with assignee selection and task movement
Stores page with Shopify configuration forms
TikTok account configuration with shop linking
AI Chat interface with shop-specific context
Settings page with user info and app details
Bottom navigation with all 5 tabs functional
Logout functionality returning to login screen
